Question: A student instead of finding the value of 7/8 of a number, found the value of 7/18 of the number. If his answer differed from the actual one by 770, find the that number.
Choices:
  A: 1584
  B: 2520
  C: 1728
  D: 1656
  E: None

Then you reflected on the problem, your solution, and the correct answer.
Use your self-reflection (below) to help you answer this question.
Any information that you are not allowed to see will be marked [REDACTED].
Error Keywords:
 - Calculation error

Reflection:
I made a calculation error when trying to solve this problem. I incorrectly multiplied the difference between 7/8 and 7/18 by 770.

Correction:
To find the correct answer, I need to set up an equation to represent the difference between the correct value (7/8 of the number) and the incorrect value (7/18 of the number).

Let x be the number.

7/8 \* x - 7/18 \* x = 770

Simplifying the equation:

(9/72) \* x - (7/72) \* x = 770

(2/72) \* x = 770

x = 770 \* (72/2)

x = 27720
